description: Athena's hierarchical knowledge base - master index

particles.summary: The 7 fundamental building blocks of every business problem: Time, Actors, Resources, Objectives, Constraints, Information, Incentives. First principles that combine into larger patterns.

molecules.summary: Emergent patterns formed by combining particles: Demand (Actors+Objectives+Information), Supply (Resources+Constraints+Time), Friction (Constraints+Information+Incentives), Value (Resources+Objectives+Actors), Risk (Time+Information+Objectives).

mental-models.summary: 5 strategic frameworks for seeing business differently: Demand Model (customer-driven growth), Incentives Model (aligned behavior design), Agentic Model (autonomous AI systems), Prismatic Model (cross-industry pattern recognition), Triptych Model (marketing+technology+game theory).

case-studies.summary: 8 real-world applications of physics-based thinking: warehouse diagnostics, product pivots, market positioning, process surgery, customer experience design, business model shifts, brand repositioning, market timing.

services.summary: 12 consulting engagements across strategy, technology, marketing, and process tiers. From £5k Process Surgery to £30k+ Secret Agency custom AI. Fixed price, fixed timeline, clear outcomes.

wisdom.summary: Strategic thinking library: business physics, game theory, cognitive patterns, decision frameworks. World-class frameworks applied to real problems.

navigation_instructions: Start with category summaries. Fetch deep knowledge only when users ask specific questions requiring detailed frameworks, pricing, or implementation guidance.
